org.krysalis.barcode4j.tools

Class MimeTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.krysalis.barcode4j.tools.MimeTypes

  • public class MimeTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines MIME types used in Barcode4J.
    Version:
    $Id: MimeTypes.java,v 1.4 2010-10-05 08:49:10 jmaerki Exp $
    Author:
    Jeremias Maerki

    • Method Detail

      • expandFormat

        public static java.lang.String expandFormat(java.lang.String format)
        Converts a short format name, such as "svg" or "eps", to its MIME type, if necessary. Known and unknown MIME types are passed through.
        Parameters:
        format - short format name or MIME type
        Returns:
        MIME type

      • isBitmapFormat

        public static boolean isBitmapFormat(java.lang.String format)
        Indicates whether a format is a bitmap format.
        Parameters:
        format - short format name or MIME type
        Returns:
        true if format is a bitmap format
